UserAccount.title: User Account
UserAccount.description: Represents a user's account within the TON Gift Marketplace.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user account, matching Firebase Auth UID.

NftGift.title: NFT Gift
NftGift.description: Represents an NFT gift owned by a user in their inventory.

id.description: Unique identifier for the NFT gift.

imageUrl.description: URL of the NFT gift's image.

isListed.description: Indicates if the NFT is listed for sale on the marketplace.

price.description: Price of the NFT gift in UZS (if listed).

collection.description: The collection to which the NFT gift belongs.

definition.description: Stores all data for a single user, including their profile and settings. The document ID must match the Firebase Auth UID.
Stores the NFT gifts that a user owns in their inventory. This is a subcollection of the user's document.
